title: Legal Education Innovation in the IR4.0 Era: Knowledge Restructuring for Digital Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal knowledge and general understanding of digital technology
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative workers who need to strengthen their ability to understand and apply the impact of IR4.0 technologies (AI, autonomous systems, etc.) on legal fields

learning_goals: Explain the transformative impact of IR4.0 technologies (artificial intelligence, data analytics, etc.) on the legal field
Analyze three or more new legal principles and cases suitable for digital environments
Apply digital literacy skills (data protection, algorithm comprehension, etc.) required in autonomous systems environments to practical tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
